tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_management_events (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  event_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  event_type VARCHAR(50) CHECK (event_type IN ('Waste Collection', 'Community Clean-up'))
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_date DATE,
    event_time TIME,
    event_location VARCHAR(255),
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE clean_up_initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_date DATE,
    initiative_location VARCHAR(255),
    initiative_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(100),
    participant_email VARCHAR(255),
    initiative_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES clean_up_initiatives(initiative_id)
)

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionEvents (
   event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   event_date DATE,
   event_type VARCHAR(50),
   location_coordinates VARCHAR(100),
   organizer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE CommunityCleanUpInitiatives (
   initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   initiative_name VARCHAR(50),
   initiative_date DATE,
   location_coordinates VARCHAR(100),
   coordinator_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Participants (
   participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   participant_name VARCHAR(50),
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Organizers (
   organizer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   organizer_name VARCHAR(50),
   organization_name VARCHAR(50),
   contact_email VARCHAR(50),
   contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    event_location VARCHAR(255),
    event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE cleanup_initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    initiative_date DATE,
    initiative_location VARCHAR(255),
    lead_organization VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE cleanup_volunteers (
    volunteer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    volunteer_name VARCHAR(255),
    volunteer_email VARCHAR(255),
    volunteer_phone VARCHAR(15),
    volunteer_skills TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE event_participation (
    participation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    volunteer_id INT,
    participation_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES waste_collection_events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (volunteer_id) REFERENCES cleanup_volunteers(volunteer_id)
);
